revision.text: {{TourismProject}}

{{TourismProject}}
I cleaned this up a bit, got the style cleaned up, and wikified things. It still needs pretty substantive work though. [[User:Particle man|Particle Man]] 05:32, 8 July 2007 (UTC)
i am sorry to type this but this page doesnt help u at all so i am going to ruin it anway!!!! i sucks!!!!!!!!!

==Assessment comment== {{Substituted comment|length=338|lastedit=20090503073624|comment=I cleaned up and expanded the introduction; I do think this industry, due to its size and critical part of a larger society's culture (both in cause and effect terms) merit a decent rating of importance. Size wise, I'm not speaking only of income generated or sales, but also of employment numbers. Beyond question they are significant.}} Substituted at 18:16, 29 April 2016 (UTC)

== Hotel management ==
hospitality and tourism [[Special:Contributions/2400:1A00:B1C0:C321:38E3:2819:8266:81E8|2400:1A00:B1C0:C321:38E3:2819:8266:81E8]] ([[User talk:2400:1A00:B1C0:C321:38E3:2819:8266:81E8|talk]]) 08:23, 12 September 2022 (UTC)
== What's economic of Hospitality industry ==
What is economic of Hospitality industry [[Special:Contributions/197.186.17.60|197.186.17.60]] ([[User talk:197.186.17.60|talk]]) 21:26, 10 December 2022 (UTC)
== Underrepresentation ==
After reviewing this article, I would like to see more information about the history of the hospitality industry. Especially in regards to historically marginalized populations.
[[User:AttackWorm22|AttackWorm22]] ([[User talk:AttackWorm22|talk]]) 00:54, 11 February 2023 (UTC)
== What is the scope of hotel management in india? ==
Please [[Special:Contributions/122.162.147.31|122.162.147.31]] ([[User talk:122.162.147.31|talk]]) 10:26, 12 June 2023 (UTC)
